attributes.action: Clarify the purpose of speed cameras
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Speed cameras are seen by safety campaigners as a road safety measure, while they are seen by the general public as a form of taxation.
We call on the government to clarify the real purpose of these cameras, by EITHER increasing the number of penatlty points and scrapping the fine, OR by increasing the fine and scrapping the penalty points.
